ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] financialClass with data type Code
Indicates the eligibility of the patient to receive a vaccine under a publicly funded vaccine program. See MIROW "IIS collaboration with VFC Program and Grantee Immunization Programs" guidelines.
Contains zero or one [0..1] financialClassAssessmentDate with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] recordId with data type Id

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the active/inactive status of the patient in the IIS. This is a jurisdictional status. See MIROW "Management of Moved or Gone Elsewhere (MOGE) and Other Patient Status Designations in IIS guidelines.
Contains zero or more [0..*] patient, where its type is Patient
Contains exactly one [1..1] publicHealthJurisdiction, where its type is Public Health Jurisdiction

Contains zero or more [0..*] financialClass with data type Code
Indicates the eligibility of the patient to receive a vaccine under a publicly funded vaccine program. See MIROW "IIS collaboration with VFC Program and Grantee Immunization Programs" guidelines.
Contains zero or one [0..1] financialClassAssessmentDate with data type Point In Time
Contains exactly one [1..1] recordId with data type Id

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the active/inactive status of the patient in the IIS. This is a jurisdictional status. See MIROW "Management of Moved or Gone Elsewhere (MOGE) and Other Patient Status Designations in IIS guidelines.
Contains zero or more [0..*] patient, where its type is Patient
Contains exactly one [1..1] publicHealthJurisdiction, where its type is Public Health Jurisdiction
